instructions: From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Emergency alerts . Select or clear check boxes for the following options: Imminent extreme alerts Imminent severe alerts AMBER alerts
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Select Gmail . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Select the account to edit. Select or clear the Notifications check box.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Select Email . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Select the account to edit. Select or clear the Notifications check box.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Under 'DEVICE,' tap Sound . Under 'RINGTONE & NOTIFICATIONS,' tap Phone ringtone . Select the file to use as your ringtone for all calls. Tap OK .

From the Home screen, tap Contacts . Tap and hold on a specific contact name. Tap Edit contact . Under 'RINGTONE,' tap Default ringtone (T-Jingle) . Select from the list of available ringtones. Tap Ok .
